telephony_alias_configuration_load_error: Oops! An error occurred while loading the number.
telephony_alias_configuration_question_c: What is an interactive voice response?
telephony_alias_configuration_question_s: What is a VXML interactive voice response?
telephony_alias_configuration_question_c: What is the Contact Center Solution ?
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_redi: Activate {{featureType}} on your line and stay connected wherever you are. Your calls are forwarded to your office phone or your personal phone, depending on your schedule.
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_cont: With {{featureType}}, you can manage your communication traffic.

Play a welcome sound, customise your waiting music and ring the phones of your different services according to the strategies you define, on selected time slots. You can specify the maximum number of callers in the queue and the maximum waiting time. If you cannot reply, your contact will be redirected to the voicemail of an OVHcloud line.
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_conf: The {{featureType}} allows you to communicate via phone with several contacts simultaneously. Protect it with a PIN, set up a personalised announcement, register attendees and receive an email report at the end of the conference.
An interface also allows you to follow participant discussions in real time and to mute their sound or microphone.
telephony_alias_config_change_type_desc_: Call forwarding allows you to redirect calls received to a chosen line or number.
telephony_alias_config_change_type_label: Forwarding while displaying this number on my SIP line or my Trunk
telephony_alias_config_change_type_desc_:
In this mode, you can redirect the number to your chosen SIP line or Trunk.

This number can also be displayed for outgoing calls from the chosen SIP line or Trunk.
The conference feature allows you to communicate via phone with several contacts simultaneously.
An interactive voice response allows you to guide the caller to the most suitable service via various options.

The VXML Interactive Voice Response allows you to use an advanced interactive menu via a 2.1 configuration. The caller is invited, via pre-recorded messages or a speech summary, to interact with the server using the keys on their phone. Depending on the configuration you have chosen, they can play sounds or transfer a call to other numbers. Please note that only transfers to OVHcloud numbers are possible.

With the call queue, you can manage the flow of your calls.

Play a welcome sound, customise your waiting music and ring your employees or different services according to the strategies you define, on selected time slots. You can set the maximum number of callers in the queue, and the maximum wait time. If you cannot reply, your contact will be redirected to the voicemail of an OVHcloud line.

Please note that in this mode of operation, call forwarding for members of your call queue will be automatically disabled.
The call queue allows you to redirect an incoming call to multiple lines, and they don’t have to be attached to your OVHcloud NIC handle.

With the expert mode of Contact Centre Solution, you can manage the flow of your calls from end to end. Choose your own strategy, depending on the calling numbers and time slots. Play welcome tones, customise your on-hold music, and ring the phones for your different services.
telephony_alias_config_redirect_line_to_: Line to which your calls will be forwarded
telephony_alias_config_redirect_alert_fo: Please note that legislation prohibits the forwarding of premium-rate numbers.
telephony_alias_config_redirect_convert_: To forward to an external line, you need to configure your number by

telephony_alias_config_conference_report: You will receive an email of the date, time, duration and list of participants in the conference call. If you have enabled it, you will also receive the conference recording as an attachment.
